title: Aptitude for Music
description:
After departing to a competing company, the Jared Carrabis era on the show is officially over (00:00:01). Brett Netzer, a former Red Sox prospect, is an admitted racist, an admitted homophobe and now... an admitted rapist (00:22:20). Donald Trump all but confirms he's running again but more importantly reveals his high aptitude for music (00:26:08). Tim in Canton's latest prank call (00:41:44). Gary Vaynerchuk shares his wisdom on Token CEO (00:51:15). A new Chris game, calls that point out Kirk's growth & more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
